channel.title: Ieldor - Races, classes, wars | Full world interaction!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/2897/asdasnl.png[/img]
[b][size=18pt]STILL DOING THREAD[/size][/b]
CONCEPTS STILL BEING WORKED ON, FEEL FREE TO GIVE US YOUR IDEAS!
[b][u]Contents[/u][/b] [b]Developers Story Line Concept Races Contributors[/b]
[u][b]Developers[/b][/u] Rash RiiPiiNFtW
[b][u]Story Line - SUBJECT TO CHANGE[/u][/b] You awaken, not knowing where or who you are. A man nearby introduces himself as ____ and initiates a conversation with you,you find out that your people have abandoned you, after beating you senseless. He tells you your name, and says that thats all he knows about you.
After your conversation with ____, you are free to wonder about the small village, and talk to the people that live there. You realize, you have the chance to re invent your entire life. Want to become a hero? Try slaying the King black dragon, or any of the other fearsome creatures that terrorize the world of Gielinor. Fancy the quiet life? Try your hand at being a craftsman, a lumberjack or even a fisherman. Someone annoying you? or do you just feel like some warfare? Enter the wilderness and fight to the death!
[u][b]Concept[/b][/u]
The races are at war with each other, and each race has sub divisons, aswell as minor "encampments" There are divisions within each race (White knights, etc) and each division has its own specialties. Current races: [b]Humans Dwarves Elves Goblins Ogres Gnomes [/b] The above races are split into classes and explained in detail below.
[u][b]Races - Expanded[/b][/u]
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/initialUpload/aubury.gif[/img] [b]Humans[/b] Who they are: The humans are a complex race. They are invading Ieldor but believe that it is theirs to take, as they have the largest cities. They believe they are the superior race, and want to rule the world. They contain both dark and good factions
Ieldor Status: Invaders
Race Bonus: 2% attack bonus, increases by 1% per rank.
Classes: Monk - Uses prayer to harm enemies or defend himself and his allies. - 1%/rank prayer bonus Knight - A master of the blade, is powerful in melee. - 1%/rank def/att/str (Knight will have subsections) Seer - A master of the Magicks, has learned all spellbooks. 1%/rank magic (Can use Ancients) Survivalist - The 'Bear Grylls' of Ieldor. - .3%/rank in all skills (like wcing, fming, etc) Archer - A master of the bow, is powerful in range. - 1%/rank range
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/initialUpload/elf.gif[/img] [b]Elves[/b] Who they are: Elves are in Ieldor to help their allies the humans fight against their enemies (Ogres, goblins, etc). They have established a homeland to the west and are mainly archers.
Ieldor Status: Invaders
Race Bonus: 2% range bonus, increases by 1% per rank.
Classes Spellcaster - A master of the Magicks, has studied and learnt every spellbook. Elven Warrior - Skilled in the art of melee combat. Monk - Uses prayer to harm enemies or defend himself and his allies. Hunter - The most advanced skill gatherers of the Elves. Archer - Uses both rapid fire and accuracy to be powerful.
Note: The Archer class is set into 3 different sub-classes.
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/initialUpload/hundred_dwarf1.gif[/img] [b]Dwarves[/b] Who are they: The Dwarves are a race which lack social skills, but are skilled craftsmen. They are found in Keldagrim.
Ieldor Status: Natives
Race Bonus: 2% defence bonus, 1% per rank.
Classes Juggernaut: Axeman:
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/initialUpload/skrach_uglogwee1.gif[/img] [b]Ogres[/b] Who they are: The Ogres are a race who lack intelligence, but make up for it in brute strength. They currently occupy the area around the fedlip hills.
Ieldor Status: Natives
Race Bonus: 2% strength bonus, increases by 1% per rank.
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/initialUpload/goblin_1.gif[/img] [b]Goblins[/b] Who they are: By far the most abundant race in all of Ieldor. What they lack in strength they more than make up for it in cunning. Their shamans are incredibly powerful and are their main strength on the battle field.
Ieldor Status: Natives
Race Bonus: 2% magic bonukiimages/en/initialUpload/gnome1.gif[/img] [b]Gnomes[/b] Who they are: The Gnomes are a peaceful race, but extremely protective of their land, no-one has ever succeeded in invading the Gnomes due to the defenses and the maze. They occupy the Tree Gnome Stronghold.
NOTE: Gnomes are NPC's and cannot be used as a character.
Ieldor Status: Natives
Race Bonus: N/A
Contributors Impulser[/center]

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I am now messing around with the cutscene packets so I can make some quality good packets. I wish they were easier to use though.

Update: All texture bugs that came with the new system are fixed. Said bugs are things such as: Animated textures fixed, white objects fixed, fps increased, invisible models on some npcs and players have been fixed, etc.

Here is the sexy Warriors Guild and Yanille:

item.title: Ieldor - Races, classes, wars | Full world interaction!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Scarecrows, post:20, topic:536086”]Finally something that looks pretty unique. However it seems like there isn’t much progress thus far, but I am looking forward to seeing some in the future.
I am working on the Embattled project: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,539866.0.html
There are actually quite a few concepts in this (such as races and classes), that are already implemented in Embattled. Perhaps we could exchange Skype addresses and discuss some ideas. I have some in mind which could work well for you.
Once again awesome idea, and nice thread.
My skype is Sir.Pattalot[/quote]Yea, I haven’t been getting anything from rash to do and i dont want to write any storylines so yea… Just been working on the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Ieldor - Races, classes, wars | Full world interaction!
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

Finally something that looks pretty unique. However it seems like there isn’t much progress thus far, but I am looking forward to seeing some in the future.
I am working on the Embattled project: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,539866.0.html
There are actually quite a few concepts in this (such as races and classes), that are already implemented in Embattled. Perhaps we could exchange Skype addresses and discuss some ideas. I have some in mind which could work well for you.
Once again awesome idea, and nice thread.
My skype is Sir.Pattalot

Read full topic

Never said it was bad.[/quote]I know you didn’t, but you dont always use english correctly so its sometimes hard to understand you.

item.title: Ieldor - Races, classes, wars | Full world interaction!
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:12, topic:536086”][quote author=Rash link=topic=654889.msg4385885#msg4385885 date=1385519790]

Wasn’t This the name of Sir Tom’s first server lol? anyways goodluck.

I’ve had this name since like 2011.

You made the weird npcs natives and the nice npcs invaders.

I wonder why.

Well, my theory is that the human race has always been the ‘explorer’, and has always claimed lands thats not theirs ;p

Thanks guys.
[/quote]
Dwarves are technacally humans, so I’d maybe count them invaders?

But nice thinking you got there! I like this. But don’t make this too unique. I know people didnt play my server because they said it was too unique (whereas I still disagree…).[/quote]
They aren’t humans, lol. THey have different features, etc. More stocky, bit uglier. But stronger.

IDC if people play or not. If i get a full storyline done, I’ll turn this into a game.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:10, topic:536086”][quote author=Titanium_ link=topic=654889.msg4385869#msg4385869 date=1385515405]
Wasn’t This the name of Sir Tom’s first server lol? anyways goodluck.
[/quote]

I’ve had this name since like 2011.

You made the weird npcs natives and the nice npcs invaders.

I wonder why.

Well, my theory is that the human race has always been the ‘explorer’, and has always claimed lands thats not theirs ;p

Thanks guys.[/quote]
Dwarves are technacally humans, so I’d maybe count them invaders?

But nice thinking you got there! I like this. But don’t make this too unique. I know people didnt play my server because they said it was too unique (whereas I still disagree…).

item.source: Ieldor - Races, classes, wars | Full world interaction!

item.title: Ieldor - Races, classes, wars | Full world interaction!
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[center]

[size=18pt]STILL DOING THREAD[/size]

CONCEPTS STILL BEING WORKED ON, FEEL FREE TO GIVE US YOUR IDEAS!

Contents
Developers
Story Line
Concept
Races
Contributors

Developers
Rash
RiiPiiNFtW

Story Line - SUBJECT TO CHANGE
You awaken, not knowing where or who you are. A man nearby introduces himself as ____ and initiates a conversation with you,you find out that your people have abandoned you, after beating you senseless. He tells you your name, and says that thats all he knows about you.

After your conversation with ____, you are free to wonder about the small village, and talk to the people that live there.
You realize, you have the chance to re invent your entire life. Want to become a hero? Try slaying the King black dragon, or any of the other fearsome creatures that terrorize the world of Gielinor. Fancy the quiet life? Try your hand at being a craftsman, a lumberjack or even a fisherman.
Someone annoying you? or do you just feel like some warfare? Enter the wilderness and fight to the death!

Concept

The races are at war with each other, and each race has sub divisons, aswell as minor "encampments"
There are divisions within each race (White knights, etc) and each division has its own specialties.
Current races:
Humans
Dwarves
Elves
Goblins
Ogres
Gnomes

The above races are split into classes and explained in detail below.

Races - Expanded


Humans
Who they are:
The humans are a complex race. They are invading Ieldor but believe that it is theirs to take, as they have the largest cities. They believe they are the superior race, and want to rule the world.
They contain both dark and good factions

Ieldor Status:
Invaders

Race Bonus:
2% attack bonus, increases by 1% per rank.

Classes:
Monk - Uses prayer to harm enemies or defend himself and his allies. - 1%/rank prayer bonus
Knight - A master of the blade, is powerful in melee. - 1%/rank def/att/str (Knight will have subsections)
Seer - A master of the Magicks, has learned all spellbooks. 1%/rank magic (Can use Ancients)
Survivalist - The ‘Bear Grylls’ of Ieldor. - .3%/rank in all skills (like wcing, fming, etc)
Archer - A master of the bow, is powerful in range. - 1%/rank range


Elves
Who they are:
Elves are in Ieldor to help their allies the humans fight against their enemies (Ogres, goblins, etc). They have established a homeland to the west and are mainly archers.

Ieldor Status:
Invaders

Race Bonus:
2% range bonus, increases by 1% per rank.

Classes
Spellcaster - A master of the Magicks, has studied and learnt every spellbook.
Elven Warrior - Skilled in the art of melee combat.
Monk - Uses prayer to harm enemies or defend himself and his allies.
Hunter - The most advanced skill gatherers of the Elves.
Archer - Uses both rapid fire and accuracy to be powerful.

Note: The Archer class is set into 3 different sub-classes.


Dwarves
Who are they:
The Dwarves are a race which lack social skills, but are skilled craftsmen. They are found in Keldagrim.

Ieldor Status:
Natives

Race Bonus:
2% defence bonus, 1% per rank.

Classes
Juggernaut:
Axeman:


Ogres
Who they are:
The Ogres are a race who lack intelligence, but make up for it in brute strength. They currently occupy the area around the fedlip hills.

Ieldor Status:
Natives

Race Bonus:
2% strength bonus, increases by 1% per rank.


Goblins
Who they are:
By far the most abundant race in all of Ieldor. What they lack in strength they more than make up for it in cunning. Their shamans are incredibly powerful and are their main strength on the battle field.

Ieldor Status:
Natives

Race Bonus:
2% magic bonukiimages/en/initialUpload/gnome1.gif[/img]
Gnomes
Who they are:
The Gnomes are a peaceful race, but extremely protective of their land, no-one has ever succeeded in invading the Gnomes due to the defenses and the maze. They occupy the Tree Gnome Stronghold.

NOTE: Gnomes are NPC’s and cannot be used as a character.

Ieldor Status:
Natives

Race Bonus:
N/A

Contributors
Impulser[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Ieldor - Races, classes, wars | Full world interaction!
